abstract: A previous post on racism drew a great deal of angry e-mail and critical commentary. The subject is worth another visit.
lead_paragraph: A post in my blog on Tuesday, about the undertone of racism in American politics, drew a great deal of angry e-mail and critical commentary, most recently from the Bill O'Reilly program on Fox News. I thought the subject was worth another visit.
